name: html5-parser

about.summary: Fast C based HTML 5 parsing for python
Fast C based HTML 5 parsing for python

raw_meta_yaml:
# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prefix-dev/recipe-format/main/schema.json
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: 0.4.12

package:
  name: html5-parser
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/h/html5-parser/html5-parser-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3d7f89841aa48b976311f43863178c34c141abcf1dd45b67a7339e61cffe5306
  patches:
    - 0000-no-build-test.diff

build:
  number: 4
  script:
    - ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation --disable-pip-version-check

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler("c") }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - pkg-config
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - crossenv
        - libxml2-devel
        - python
  host:
    - libxml2-devel
    - pip
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - chardet
    - lxml >=3.8.0
    - python

tests:
  - python:
      imports: html5_parser
      pip_check: true
  - files:
      source:
        - test/
    requirements:
      run:
        - beautifulsoup4
        - coverage
        - pytest <8
    script:
      file: run_test.py

about:
  summary: Fast C based HTML 5 parsing for python
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  homepage: https://html5-parser.readthedocs.io

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl

about.summary: Fast C based HTML 5 parsing for python
